The notification will be post in

If you need a custom layout, you can apply NotificationCompat.DecoratedCustomViewStyle to your notification. This API allows you to provide a custom layout for the content area normally occupied by the title and text content, while still using system decorations for the notification icon, timestamp, sub-text, and action buttons.
